resources.string: Mobile App Development is a student organization at the University of Texas. We are focused on building the UT community by creating a learning environment for all students through our workshops, hack nights, conferences, and other awesome events. We want to build the next generation of successful developers, designers, and entrepreneurs.

MAD Conference is an annual student-run developer conference that aims to provide an environment to learn, develop, and grow. The schedule is a mixture of workshops, tech talks, and coding challenges led by industry engineers.
